author.name: Alexander Solaat Rodland
author.bio: Microsoft MVP and Principal Cloud Engineer

frontmatter.title: TechTalk - Employee enablement and training
frontmatter.description: Watch episode 2 with Briand Sanderson and Alexander Solaat Rødland talk about the importance of- and how to enable employees and ready the IT department.

frontmatter.title: Live Event - Introduction to GitOps
frontmatter.description: In this inaugural meetup event, we want to share our thoughts on the concept of GitOps, why we need it and how it can be implemented.

frontmatter.title: TechTalk - Cloud Transitions
frontmatter.description: Watch episode 3 with Briand Sanderson and Alexander Solaat Rødland talk about the process of transitioning to the cloud and what to be mindful of.

frontmatter.title: Changes in Microsoft Partner program and how this has changed our skilling focus
frontmatter.description: From October 3rd Microsoft changed its Partner Programme. The Gold and Silver partner designations are being replaced with Solutions Partner designations.
